players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "This is terrible! Alice was such a valuable member of our community. We need to be very careful about who we trust now."
You: "I agree with Diana. Let's stay vigilant and pay close attention to each other's actions and words."
Diana: "Bob, you agreed with me very quickly. That seems suspicious - are you trying to buddy up to avoid suspicion? We should all be more questioning of each other."
Charlie: "Diana, your suspicious behavior last night raises concerns. It's important that we all remain transparent and trustworthy in this game."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
